title: Bedcover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, wool wadding
Technique: trapunto quilting
description: Bedcover with a blue side and a yellow side held together by quilting in a pattern of flowers in a frame formed by crossing diagonal lines within a wide border worked in a flower pattern. Quilting in yellow silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 18th century. Medium: silk, wool wadding
Technique: trapunto quilting. 1932-9-2.
